name: (Ludum Dare 42)Plasma Destruction Legion
description:
Basically...
This is a space shooter  for the Ludum Dare 42 game jam.

The goal is to get as many kills as you can before you run out of energy
or take too much damage.

Controls

Keyboard-

"P" pauses

"Up and Down arrow keys" - Forward and reverse thrust

"Right and Left arrow keys" - rotate ship

"Space" - shoots

"Left Shift" - handbrake(you'll need it)

XBOX 360 controller or GAMEPAD equivalent

Right analog for thrusts(2 direction movement)

Left analog for rotation

"Right trigger" - shoots

"Left trigger" - handbrake

"Start" - pause
